926 
 
POLYTECHNIC/COURSE  COURSE REQUIREMENTS  UTME SUBJECTS  REMARKS/WAIVER  
 FEDPO-BAU      
 FEDPO-EDE      
FEDPO-IDA     FEDPO-MUB  
FEDWILD-NBUS   
 KAD-POLY      
KWA-POLY  
LASPOTECH  
MAPOLY  
NASPOTECH       
PLS-POLY    
YABATECH  
Economics/Commerce, History, Book  
Keeping Principles of Accounting,  
Mathematics, Fine Arts, French  
Language, Government, Food and  
Nutrition, Nigerian Language, Home  
Economics  
  
A credit pass in Mathematics is 
compulsory.  
  
 b) YABATECH requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Mathematics, English Language, Geography 
and two (2) of Economics, History, Commerce, 
Government, French, Food and Nutrition. Also 
requires as UTME subjects Mathematics, 
Geography and one of Economics,  
Biology/Agricultural Science.  
c) PH-POLY same as in Computer Science.  
d) KAD-POLY requires Mathematics, Geography 
and any one (1) of Biology/Agricultural Science, 
History, Government or Economics as UTME 
subjects.  
e) FEDPO-EDE requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes in English Language Mathematics,  
 Geography,  Biology/Agricultural  
Science/Animal Husbandry and any one of the 
following, History, Economics, Commerce, 
Government, History, Biology/Agricultural 
Science, Food and Nutrition, Chemistry, 
Physics or French.  
f) FEDPO-BAU accepts four (4) ‘O’ level credit 
passes at not more than two (2) sittings as 
minimum entry requirements into ND Leisure 
and Tourism Management.  The subjects must 
include English Language and Geography, and 
any two (2) from the following:  Histo ry and 
Geography, and any two (2) of History,  
 Economics,  Government,  Mathematics,  
Biology, Food and Nutrition and French.  
g) MAPOLY requires four (4) ‘O’ level credits at 
one (1) sitting or five (5) credit passes at not 
more than two (2) sittings to include English 
Language and Geography with Mathematics 
with at least a pass in Mathematics  
h) FEDPO-EDE requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics and 
any other three (3) from the following: 
Economics, Tourism, Catering Craft, 
Geography, Economics, Commerce, 
Government, Home Economics, Biology/ 
Agricultural Science/ Health Science/ Animal 
Husbandry, Physics and Chemistry.
